ingredients.content: 12 oz fresh pineapple, ripe, cubed (1 in.)
2 oz red bell pepper, finely diced

preparations.content: Place orange juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, chilies, star anise, ginger, cloves, cardamom and allspice into mixing bowl and cook <b>10 min/212°F/speed <b>.
With a slotted spoon, remove and discard: cinnamon, chilies, star anise, cardamom and allspice.
Add pineapple and cook <b>1 min/212°F/speed <b>. Transfer pineapple mixture to a large bowl and set aside.

Place a bowl onto mixing bowl lid. Weigh in onions, red pepper, strawberries, cucumber, cilantro, salt and pepper. Transfer into large bowl with pineapple mixture and combine with spatula. Cover and place in the refrigerator.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position, weigh in shrimp, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>12-15 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>, until shrimp are cooked through.
Peel and devein steamed shrimp. Place salsa into serving dishes, top with shrimp and serve immediately.
